overview:
Dr. Vijay Chandru is an academic entrepreneur, most notably the Co-Founder, Chairman & CEO of Strand Life Sciences, a biotechnology software company based in Bangalore. He is currently the President of the Association of Biotech Led Enterprises (ABLE), the apex trade body representing the Indian biotechnology industry. His academic career has spanned over two decades at Purdue University, the Indian Institute of Science, and the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.

Chandru is the recipient of several awards and honors: World Economic Forum Technology Pioneer (2007), Fellow of Indian Academy of Sciences (1996), MCIT Dewang Mehta Award for Innovation in IT (2001), UGC Hari Om Trust award for “Science and Society” (2003), the President’s Medal of INFORMS in 2006, distinguished Alumni award by the MIT India Program in 2007, and was recognized as the Biospectrum Biotech Entrepreneur of 2007.
